govukheading: Check plant health information and import rules
govukbodytitle: Use this service to find information on the pest or disease risks of importing a plant to Great Britain (England, Scotland and Wales).

a1.text1: Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs

appliesToSection.appliesToText:
Applies to
 England, Scotland and Wales

textBeforeStartNowSection.paragraphText1: Use this service to find out
textBeforeStartNowSection.bulletText1: the latest rules for importing plants or plant products
textBeforeStartNowSection.bulletText2: if a plant could carry pests and diseases that need reporting
textBeforeStartNowSection.bulletText3:
current information on non-native plants pests and diseases
 that are a risk to Great Britain

textAfterStartNowSection.paragraphText1:
You'll need the name of the plant/ plant product/ pest or disease to find plant
 health
 information
textAfterStartNowSection.bulletText1: the scientific name or any synonyms
textAfterStartNowSection.bulletText2: a common name in some cases
textAfterStartNowSection.bulletText3: does not provide trade information about exporting plants or plant products
textAfterStartNowSection.bulletText4: it is not a pest or disease identification service
textAfterStartNowSection.bulletText5: does not have information about pests and diseases native to Great Britain

a1.text1: Import plants and plant products from the EU to Great Britain

a2.text2: Import plants and plant products from non-EU countries to Great Britain

a3.text3: Import high-risk food and feed not of animal origin from the EU to Great Britain

a4.text4: Import of products, animals, food and feed system (IPAFFS)

a5.text5: Import or export endangered species: check if you need a CITES permit

a6.text6: Fresh fruit and vegetable marketing standard

a8.text8:
Reporting a
 plant pest or disease

supportUrl.text: if you have any queries or you need technical support, email
